gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.util.g3d

Class ImmediateRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.util.g3d.ImmediateRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ImmediateModeRenderer

    public class ImmediateRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ImmediateModeRenderer
    Immediate mode rendering class for GLES 2.0. The renderer will allow you to specify vertices on the fly and provides a default shader for (unlit) rendering.
    Author:
    mzechner
